name: instantDeletion
description: This causes the deletion slot to delete items instantly, similar to Creative Mode.

name: enableDeleteKeysInCreative
description: Set to true if you want the delete keybindings to work in creative as well. Note: Items will be deleted permanently in creative, regardless of instantDeletion setting!

name: enableHints
description: TrashSlot will show a hint the first time the trash slot is toggled off or can be enabled on a supported screen. Set to false to disable.

name: allowDeletionWhileTrashSlotIsInvisible
description: Not recommended, but this will allow you to use the keybinds for deleting items even if the trash slot itself is hidden.

name: deletionDenyList
description: List of items that cannot be deleted, in comma-separated format of "modid:name".
